page.title: 02EDUCATION in GIRVAN
page.content: Education in {GIRVAN}is given in.... 1.A nursery school with a staff of six and 121 pupils. 2.Invergarven special school for physically and mentally handicapped. 3.Girvan primary school with a roll of 600 and 23 teachers. 4.Sacred Heart primary with 131 pupils and 6 teachers. 5.Sacred Heart Academy with 167 pupils and 16 teachers. 6.Girvan Academy with 605 pupils and 57 teachers. Further Education classes are held in many subjects during the winter.A recent innovation has been a number of adults returning to classes during the school day.
